_header: Alms your mercy me my sweet
Subjects: love lyrics; lovers, addresses to beloved; roundels

BLHar682.First Lines:
ALmes yowre mercy me my sweteAnd make me yowre
                    bedeman…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…ffor were yowre grace me gyven þanI were to riche a man
                    to wete
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
